v1.17.0.description: adds an option to set aspect ratio for the entire module to limit flash of content on load

v1.16.0.description: fixes in issue where call to action focus state was incorrect and inaccessable on dark backgrounds

v1.15.0.description: fixes call to action text to be black on light backgrounds
removes 'Microsoft' name from label and logotype on logo

v1.10.0.description: adds image priority option to feature giving a 65/35 split and taller height on image
updates css and image sizes to allow for fixed aspect ratio
